price: 在他们灭亡之后，我以你们成为大地上的代治者，以便我看你们怎样工作。
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ خَلَٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ لِنَنظُرَ كَيۡفَ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnākum khalāifa fī al-arḍi min baʿdihim linanẓura kayfa taʿmalūna
